actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an exclusion from gross income for AmeriCorps educational awards.
short_title: Segal AmeriCorps Education Award Tax Relief Act of 2011

summary.text: Segal AmeriCorps Education Award Tax Relief Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income for income tax purposes AmeriCorps educational awards awarded under the National and Community Service Act of 1990.

titles.title: Segal AmeriCorps Education Award Tax Relief Act of 2011
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an exclusion from gross income for AmeriCorps educational awards.
